item.title: Multi Vehicle Mixed Integer Programming
item.description:

ewcommand{\pp}{p_{p}}$ In this post, we take a look at this $[1]$ paper, which introduces a simple, yet interesting approach to solving a multi-vehicle path planning problem. My implementation of the algorithm that was used to evaluate its performance and generate all the results in this post can be found here
